Hello there. 

I am looking for any back-propagation algorithm that can wor=
k on 
networks with arbitrary topology such as these that NEAT evolves. All=
 
libraries I found so far either assume layered networks or only feed-
for=
ward ones.. I am confused. Is there any source code that might help 
me? An=
y back-prop implementation that can work on NEAT networks such 
that it can=
 easily be integrated. Or maybe some papers on the topic? 
I appreciate any=
 help from the community.
